reviewText: Lot of great humour, interesting stories and it's resolutions. The only bad thing: there is a grain of truth in every joke.

Very Very funny.  Also, timely and timeless.  Nothing has changed in bureaucracy, civil service or politics.
This arrived on a rainy weekend, and I watched the entire set.  I've had this a couple months and watched the whole set three times now.

If you want to think, laugh out loud, and get angry all at the same time this is the series for you.  The situations are as fresh and as real as this morning's news story; the politics are both universal and timely.  The characters are like people you know or know of.  And the lies they tell are ones you've heard before and will hear over and over again.  You will laugh, laugh, and laugh some more no matter how many times you watch it.

Just loved it so far, remember it from years ago, and even today it is so typical of governments in UK and over here in Ausie Land.
A big thank you to the writers. they were very good.

These are the BBC TV series and I love these series for more than 30 years. Many episodes are politically so real and contain intelligent black humors. I reccomend you to watch these DVDs in addition to the books.

Very interesting from GB politic's ways of beeing, doing, deciding, and so on.
Extremely funny and sarcastic. The script writers have atually been employed afterwards as speech writers for real politicians.
It reminds you of how small we are, and how unsignificant, but also clever sometimes.
British humor at its best. Fantastic actors. Smartest screenplay. Sometimes it seems that these stories might be quite real after all! Absolutely must have and must watch.
Lost of sense of humor, very mucha what si critized about politics today is in the series. You laugh a lot. Really amusing

Here in the US...we call the government AND OUR PRESS (especially CNN and the Washington Post)...The Swamp...

These two great series happened before The Swamp got it's name...  This is a good example of a brave man...as both a cabinet minister AND Prime Minister...trying to drain the swamp only to find the swamp trying to drown him at every turn...and having it backfire almost every time...

I just wished out Public Blackmail System here didn't cut these two from their program lists...
this is a very classic comedy!
Did not have time to view it, however, I have been told it is excellent which is the reason I bought it.
Fabulous series but this DVD package is for Europe not US

This video package did not play on my Blu-Ray.  I kept getting a notice saying it was "INVALID".  Since I'm a big fan of the "Yes Minister" and "Yes Prime Minister" series, this was a great disappointment.  One star should be no stars.

Kind of disappointed in this. First, if you buy it in the US, you have to change your media systems settings so it can play the DVD. Also, one of the episodes listed on one of the disk containers isn't even on the disk at all. Episodes are still good, but why even bother listing it on the case if certain episodes aren't even on the disk?
Hilarious.  A must if one is interested in the process of government.
Excellent quality all 'round, great show, great seller, and super-fast shipping!

Hacker: Why cant ministers go anywhere without briefs?
Bernard: Its in case they get caught with their trousers down.

One of my favorite series till date.

The packages arrived in time and are working fine
Thanks
